dialogueTree.title: Logic: "These are the same belts as the one..."
dialogueTree.english: These are the same belts as the one the victim was hanged with.
dialogueTree.polish: Na takim samym pasie powieszono ofiarę.
dialogueTree.belarusian: На такім самым пасе павесілі ахвяру.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "I knew it was a cargo lashing belt!"
links.english: I knew it was a cargo lashing belt!
links.polish: Oczywiście, że to pas do mocowania ładunku!
links.belarusian: Вядома, што гэта стужка для мацавання грузу!

links.title: You: ""Look, lieutenant. The same belts a..."
links.english: "Look, lieutenant. The same belts as the one the victim was hanged with. Says *Vermillion* on the side..."
links.polish: „Spójrz, poruczniku. Na takim samym pasie powieszono ofiarę. Z boku jest napis »Vermillion«...”
links.belarusian: «Глядзіце, лейтэнант. На такім жа пасе павесілі ахвяру. Збоку надпіс "Вермільён"...»

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right. This is probably whe..."
links.english: "You're right. This is probably where Titus and his men got the belt." The lieutenant looks at the pile.
links.polish: „Racja. Pewnie właśnie stąd Titus i jego ludzie zdobyli swój” – porucznik spogląda na stos.
links.belarusian: «Мабыць, менавіта адсюль Ціт і яго людзі атрымалі свой» — лейтэнант паглядзеў на стос.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""More ammo on our belt for the rema..."
links.english: "More ammo on our belt for the remainder of the investigation. Good find, detective."
links.polish: „To niemal jak pas na amunicję dowodów w naszym śledztwie. Dobra robota, detektywie”.
links.belarusian: «Гэта амаль як пояс для боепрыпасаў доказаў у нашым расследаванні. Добрая праца, дэтэктыў».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right." The lieutenant look..."
links.english: "You're right." The lieutenant looks at the pile. "This certainly confirms the theory that the belt must've come from inside the harbour."
links.polish: „Racja” – porucznik spogląda na stos. „To potwierdzałoby naszą tezę, że pas musiał pochodzić z portu”.
links.belarusian: «Сапраўды», — лейтэнант паглядзеў на стос. «Гэта пацвярджае нашу тэзу, што пояс павінен быў паходзіць з порта».

links.title: You: "The same exact belts. Even the same..."
links.english: The same exact belts. Even the same writing...
links.polish: Dokładnie takie same pasy. Nawet czcionka jest identyczna...
links.belarusian: Дакладна такія ж палосы. Нават шрыфт аднолькавы...

links.title: Logic: "Indeed, it appears so. This is wher..."
links.english: Indeed, it appears so. This is where the belt came from.
links.polish: W rzeczy samej, na to wygląda. Stąd pochodził tamten pas.
links.belarusian: Сапраўды, на тое выглядае. Адтуль паходзіў той пас.
